package.name: Flex3 Beta程序修改器（Xina）-Rootless
package.shortDescription: 来了老弟修复！Before use, please copy the application bundle that needs to be parsed to/var/jb/usr/lib/TweakInject/Flex.plist and fill it in. Warning: System patches are not supported, do not fill in com.apple.UIKit or com.apple.springboard。Only effective for third-party applications, the patch list can be parsed and displayed.。使用前请把需要解析的应用bundle拷贝到/var/jb/usr/lib/TweakInject/Flex.plist中填入，警告：不支持系统补丁，不要填入com.apple.UIKit或com.apple.springboard等，只对第三方应用生效，可解析，可显示补丁列表。

descriptionlist.description: 来了老弟修复！Before use, please copy the application bundle that needs to be parsed to/var/jb/usr/lib/TweakInject/Flex.plist and fill it in. Warning: System patches are not supported, do not fill in com.apple.UIKit or com.apple.springboard。Only effective for third-party applications, the patch list can be parsed and displayed.。使用前请把需要解析的应用bundle拷贝到/var/jb/usr/lib/TweakInject/Flex.plist中填入，警告：不支持系统补丁，不要填入com.apple.UIKit或com.apple.springboard等，只对第三方应用生效，可解析，可显示补丁列表。
